metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12616 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
When using a VirtualDirContext with Apache Tomcat 7.0.0 to 7.0.80 it waspossible to bypass security constraints and/or view the source code of JSPsfor resources served by the VirtualDirContext using a specially craftedrequest.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12616` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libservlet3.1-java - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
libtomcat8-embed-java - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
libtomcat8-java - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
tomcat8 - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
tomcat8-admin - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
tomcat8-common - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
tomcat8-examples - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
tomcat8-user - 8.5.30-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tomcat7 package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
tomcat8 package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.5.30-1ubuntu1').
